title: Ebro In The Morning - Guest Lamar Odom + The Great Tex-Mex Debate
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 7/15.

Lamar Odom talks about Kobe, addiction, and celebrity boxing (25), Laura Stylez has her patented Flashing Lights segments (7:00, 1:04 & 1:26) and we find out who played themselves (14).

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
